Shrey weds Anya

  • About
We are getting married !
12-12-16
Where?

Rudraksha club and resort is situated on SH-27 (Indore - Ujjain Highway) in Madhya Pradesh, India. The nearest airport is Indore Airport. Please contact us to arrange for a ride to the venue.

See Program Details

Program Details

Here are the program details

  • 11 December, 4.00 PM

    Mehandi

    Apply Henna to groom, bride, and anyone intrested

  • 11 December, 7.00 PM

    Sangeet

    Choregraphed dances by relatives and friends

  • 12 December, 9.00 AM

    Bana

    Anya and Shrey go to Temple

  • 12 December, 11.00 AM

    Sagai

    Anya and Shrey exchange Rings

  • 12 December, 4.00 PM

    Phere

    Anya and Shrey Exchange Vows

  • 12 December, 5.30 PM

    Baraat

    Shrey comes to get Anya on a horse

  • 12 December, 6.00 PM

    Wedding Reception

    Dinner

Meet Anya and Shrey

Know more about the bride and the groom

Anya

Anna Lvovskaia (Anya) was born in Moscow, Russia. She likes horse riding, painting, and music

Shrey

Shreyans Jain (Babbu) was born in Ujjain, India. He likes to fly kites and play cricket.
